attributes.action: Provide free parking for all NHS staff on site
attributes.additional_details: All Key workers necessary to run a hospital should be provided with safe parking on site to ease the existing financial stress on an already stressful role in society. We should be taking more care of the people who care for us.
attributes.background: Provide free parking for all NHS staff at their place of work

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612699
